name: El Valle de Abbatis (DEMO)
description:
You play as Jefferson, a soldier left for dead on the dunes of Mars, rescued by a salvaging party from a nearby outpost.

This is a short introductory chapter from a larger game still in development. The game is set 200 years in the future, on a colonized Mars. This Game Demo is in Spanish only. It was created as a final project for one of my university classes and a full game is in the works. Game made by Bordachar Juan Manuel, Donoso Maria Sol, Farina Lucas, and myself.
